body: Base Form any; Primary Evolutions resistance (acid, cold, fire); Secondary Evolutions basic magic (acid splash); bite, claws, slam, or tentacle; damage reduction (good); flight; immunity (electricity); magic attacks; major magic (darkness or see invisibility); minor magic (detect good or vanish); spell resistance; ultimate magic (gaseous form or stinking cloud) or dimension door.
